con:request.name: 2.RetrieveFareQuote
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Pricing.Request.FareQuote"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrieveFareQuote> <!--Optional:--> <tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestCase#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
</rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>::1</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>Web</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:CurrencyOfFareQuote>${#TestCase#currency}</rad1:CurrencyOfFareQuote> <rad1:PromotionalCode>${empty}</rad1:PromotionalCode> <rad1:IataNumberOfRequestor xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:CorporationID>-214</rad1:CorporationID> <rad1:FareFilterMethod>NoCombinabilityAllFares</rad1:FareFilterMethod> <rad1:FareGroupMethod>WebFareTypes</rad1:FareGroupMethod> <rad1:InventoryFilterMethod>Available</rad1:InventoryFilterMethod> <rad1:FareQuoteDetails> <rad1:FareQuoteDetail> <rad1:Origin>${#TestCase#Origin}</rad1:Origin> <rad1:Destination>${#TestCase#Destination}</rad1:Destination> <rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups>true</rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroups> <rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule>true</rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsAsRule> <rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom>true</rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForFrom> <rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo>true</rad1:UseAirportsNotMetroGroupsForTo> <rad1:DateOfDeparture>${#TestCase#DepartureDate}</rad1:DateOfDeparture> <rad1:FareTypeCategory>1</rad1:FareTypeCategory> <rad1:FareClass>${empty}</rad1:FareClass> <rad1:FareBasisCode>${empty}</rad1:FareBasisCode> <rad1:Cabin>${empty}</rad1:Cabin> <rad1:LFID>0</rad1:LFID> <rad1:OperatingCarrierCode>${empty}</rad1:OperatingCarrierCode> <rad1:MarketingCarrierCode>${empty}</rad1:MarketingCarrierCode> <rad1:NumberOfDaysBefore>0</rad1:NumberOfDaysBefore> <rad1:NumberOfDaysAfter>0</rad1:NumberOfDaysAfter> <rad1:LanguageCode>en</rad1:LanguageCode> <rad1:TicketPackageID xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:FareQuoteRequestInfos> <rad1:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad1:PassengerTypeID>6</rad1:PassengerTypeID><rad1:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad1:TotalSeatsRequired></rad1:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad1:FareQuoteRequestInfo><rad1:PassengerTypeID>1</rad1:PassengerTypeID><rad1:TotalSeatsRequired>1</rad1:TotalSeatsRequired></rad1:FareQuoteRequestInfo> </rad1:FareQuoteRequestInfos><rad1:ActionType>NewBooking</rad1:ActionType> </rad1:FareQuoteDetail>
</rad1:FareQuoteDetails> <rad1:ProfileId>-214</rad1:ProfileId> </tem:RetrieveFareQuoteRequest> </tem:RetrieveFareQuote> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: Transfer LFID PHYID FareId and TripId

con:request.name: 3.SummaryPNR
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:SummaryPNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:SummaryPnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestCase#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> </rad:CarrierCodes> <rad:ClientIPAddress>::1</rad:ClientIPAddress> <rad:HistoricUserName>Web</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:ActionType>GetSummary</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad1:SecurityToken>${#TestCase#securityToken}</rad1:SecurityToken> <rad1:CarrierCurrency>${#TestCase#currency}</rad1:CarrierCurrency> <rad1:DisplayCurrency>CAD</rad1:DisplayCurrency> <rad1:IATANum xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:User xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--If not sure of receipt language id then provide value as 1. System picks default language Id--> <rad1:ReceiptLanguageID>1</rad1:ReceiptLanguageID> <rad1:PromoCode>${empty}</rad1:PromoCode> <rad1:ExternalBookingID>${empty}</rad1:ExternalBookingID> <rad1:Address> <rad1:Address1>${#TestCase#p_HomeAddress}</rad1:Address1> <rad1:Address2>${empty}</rad1:Address2> <rad1:City>${#TestCase#p_HomeCity}</rad1:City> xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:Passengers> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:Person> <rad1:PersonOrgID>-1</rad1:PersonOrgID> <rad1:FirstName>${#TestCase#p_FirstName}</rad1:FirstName> <rad1:LastName>${#TestCase#p_LastName}</rad1:LastName> <rad1:MiddleName>${#TestCase#p_MiddleName}</rad1:MiddleName> <rad1:TravelsWithPersonOrgID>-2147483648</rad1:TravelsWithPersonOrgID> <rad1:RedressNumber>${empty}</rad1:RedressNumber> <rad1:KnownTravelerNumber>${empty}</rad1:KnownTravelerNumber> <rad1:MarketingOptIn>false</rad1:MarketingOptIn> <rad1:UseInventory>true</rad1:UseInventory> <rad1:Address> <rad1:Address1>${#TestCase#p_HomeAddress}</rad1:Address1> <rad1:Address2>${empty}</rad1:Address2> <rad1:City>${#TestCase#p_HomeCity}</rad1:City> <rad1:State>${#TestCase#p_HomeState}</rad1:State> <rad1:Postal>${#TestCase#p_HomePostal}</rad1:Postal> <rad1:Display>${empty}</rad1:Display> </rad1:Address> <rad1:Company>${empty}</rad1:Company> <rad1:Comments>${empty}</rad1:Comments> <rad1:Passport>${empty}</rad1:Passport> <rad1:Nationality>USA</rad1:Nationality> <rad1:ProfileId>-2147483648</rad1:ProfileId> <rad1:IsPrimaryPassenger>true</rad1:IsPrimaryPassenger> <rad1:ContactInfos> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:ContactInfo> <rad1:ContactID>-1</rad1:ContactID> <rad1:PersonOrgID>-1</rad1:PersonOrgID> <rad1:ContactField>${#TestCase#p_Email}</rad1:ContactField> <rad1:ContactType>Email</rad1:ContactType> <rad1:Extension>${empty}</rad1:Extension> <rad1:CountryCode>${empty}</rad1:CountryCode> <rad1:AreaCode>${empty}</rad1:AreaCode> <rad1:PhoneNumber>${empty}</rad1:PhoneNumber> <rad1:Display>${#TestCase#p_Email}</rad1:Display> <rad1:PreferredContactMethod>true</rad1:PreferredContactMethod> </rad1:ContactInfo>
</rad1:ContactInfos> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:FrequentFlyerNumber>${empty}</rad1:FrequentFlyerNumber> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:Suffix>JR</rad1:Suffix> <rad1:Weight>60</rad1:Weight> <rad1:Height>170</rad1:Height> </rad1:Person>
<rad1:Person> <rad1:PersonOrgID>-2</rad1:PersonOrgID> <rad1:FirstName>${#TestCase#p_FirstNameCHDOne}</rad1:FirstName> <rad1:LastName>${#TestCase#p_LastName}</rad1:LastName> <rad1:MiddleName>${#TestCase#p_MiddleNameCHDone}</rad1:MiddleName> <rad1:Age>${#TestCase#CHD_age}</rad1:Age> <rad1:DOB>${#TestCase#CHD_DOB}</rad1:DOB> <rad1:Gender>Male</rad1:Gender> <rad1:Title>MSTR</rad1:Title> <rad1:NationalityLaguageID>840</rad1:NationalityLaguageID> <rad1:RelationType>Son</rad1:RelationType> <rad1:WBCID>-214</rad1:WBCID> <rad1:PTCID>6</rad1:PTCID> <rad1:PTC>CHD</rad1:PTC> <rad1:TravelsWithPersonOrgID>-2147483648</rad1:TravelsWithPersonOrgID> <rad1:RedressNumber>${empty}</rad1:RedressNumber> <rad1:ContactField>${#TestCase#p_Email}</rad1:ContactField> <rad1:ContactType>Email</rad1:ContactType> <rad1:Extension>${empty}</rad1:Extension> <rad1:CountryCode>${empty}</rad1:CountryCode> <rad1:AreaCode>${empty}</rad1:AreaCode> <rad1:PhoneNumber>${empty}</rad1:PhoneNumber> <rad1:Display>${#TestCase#p_Email}</rad1:Display> <rad1:PreferredContactMethod>true</rad1:PreferredContactMethod> </rad1:ContactInfo>
</rad1:ContactInfos> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:FrequentFlyerNumber>${empty}</rad1:FrequentFlyerNumber> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:Suffix>MR</rad1:Suffix> <rad1:Weight>60</rad1:Weight> <rad1:Height>170</rad1:Height> </rad1:Person>
</rad1:Passengers> <rad1:Segments> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:Segment><rad1:PersonOrgID>-1</rad1:PersonOrgID><rad1:FareInformationID>${#TestCase#fareid}</rad1:FareInformationID><rad1:MarketingCode>${empty}</rad1:MarketingCode><rad1:StoreFrontID>${empty}</rad1:StoreFrontID><rad1:RecordLocator>${empty}</rad1:RecordLocator><rad1:SpecialServices xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/><rad1:Seats xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/><rad1:CRSCode>${empty}</rad1:CRSCode></rad1:Segment>
</rad1:Segments> <rad1:Payments xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:Comment>Radixx testing comments</rad1:Comment> <!--Referral ID is a third party web site id or name where booking is initiated--> <rad1:ReferralID>${empty}</rad1:ReferralID> </tem:SummaryPnrRequest> </tem:SummaryPNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 4.AssessPaymentMethod
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Fees.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> <!--Optional:--> <tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestCase#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode><rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>${#Project#TS_CarrierCode}</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode></rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>${empty}</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>${empty}</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> <rad1:PaymentMethod>CASH</rad1:PaymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:PaymentMethodType>${empty}</rad1:PaymentMethodType> <rad1:CardNumber>${empty}</rad1:CardNumber> <rad1:PaymentAmount>${#TestCase#ResBalance}</rad1:PaymentAmount> </rad1:PaymentToAssessFee> </rad1:PaymentsToAssessFee> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFeesRequest> </tem:AssessPaymentMethodFees> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
